overview: A software engineer with more than 9 years of experience and international working experience in embedded and pc applications. Three years as PC software engineer, two years as Windows CE/.Net CF engineer, two years as embedded software detailed design for car’s dashboards, two years as java/OSGi/linux embedded software design and implementation. More than 6 years of local team management experience, broad understanding and in-depth experience in full life-cycle software development, rick experience dealilng with critical software project and international customer.
